incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue with TFC Buildkite plugin GH e2e tests failing

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the TFC Buildkite plugin GH e2e tests failing issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue plugin GH e2e tests failing. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Twilio API Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Voice, Messaging, Video, PSTN Connectivity and Webhooks were degraded for 46 minutes between 07:34 and 08:20 Pacific Time on 11/12/2025. incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue with Call Failures From Subscribers To Cayman Islands Twilio Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the Call Failures From Subscribers To Cayman Islands Twilio Phone Numbers, and it was determined that the impact was limited to a small set of customers, who have been contacted individually to address any concerns. All systems are operational.

We continue observing issue with Call Failures From Subscribers To Cayman Islands Twilio Phone Numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Call Failures From Subscribers To Cayman Islands Twilio Phone Numbers. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Billing Notifications Failed to Send for 20 Minutes

incident_updates.body: Twilio Billing notifications were degraded for 20 minutes between 08:00 and 08:20 Pacific Time on 11/10/2025. During this period of time customers may have experienced problems receiving emails regarding their billing. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Messages not Retrievable via the Messaging Logs API or Visible in the Messaging Console

incident_updates.body: The issue impacting messages created between 05:00-05:10 and 05:30-05:40 UTC on Oct 28 which were not retrievable via the Messaging Logs API and the Messaging Console is now resolved. All known major data flows have now been restored and backfilled. Engineering teams will ensure any minor edge data discrepancies are restored before Friday, November 14th.
